casebody.data:
Sharonell FULTON, et al., applicants,
v.
CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, PENNSYLVANIA, et al. No. 18A118. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 30, 2018. Justice THOMAS, Justice ALITO, and Justice GORSUCH would grant the application.

Application for injunctive relief presented to Justice ALITO and by him referred to the Court denied.
